Foxie Cosmetics Fixed Setting Spray (2020 formulation)

Brand: Foxie Cosmetics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: : Evian Mineral Water, Glycerin (made from soy), Laminaria (Algae) extract, sodium hyaluronate, Algae extract, pullulan, ethanol, Larrea Tridentata (Chaparral) extract, Hydrastis Canadensis (Goldenseal) extract Ceratonia Silqua Fruit Extract , Sodium Benzonate, Citric Acid.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
